sentences:
Soccer Kid is a platform video game created by UK - based developer Krisalis and released in 1993 for the Commodore Amiga , 1994 for the Super NES , PC , Amiga CD32 and 3DO Interactive Multiplayer .
Its title for the Super NES in the United States is The Adventures of Kid Kleets .
It was re - released for the Atari Jaguar in 2000 , the Game Boy Advance on September 30 , 2002 and the PlayStation on December 13 , 2003 .
The goal of the game is to guide a little soccer player boy through various levels , using his soccer ball as the main tool .
The player character can perform runs , shots , bicycle kicks , headers and other sorts of soccer moves to either advance in the level or eliminate enemies .
